channel.title: Animate Platelegs
channel.description: Hey guys so I'm putting in torva legs to my server but I can't get them to move with my body. Datmaker animates everything but legs and bodies, so I was wondering if anyone knew how to do it. Thanks!

item.title: Animate Platelegs

@bandostheory wrote:

Hey guys so I’m putting in torva legs to my server but I can’t get them to move with my body. Datmaker animates everything but legs and bodies, so I was wondering if anyone knew how to do it. Thanks!
